sentences.en: Paper was scarce and expensive, so typically they drew the design onto a white tabletop.
sentences.cn: 纸又少又贵，所以他们通常把设计图案画在白色的桌面上。

sentences.en: Plug your tabletop lamp into a dimmer instead of the wall socket.
sentences.cn: 直接把你的台灯插到调光器上，而不用插到墙上的插座里。

sentences.en: He also pioneered tabletop role-playing games.
sentences.cn: 他还是桌面角色扮演游戏的先行者。
